thread.section_title: The Raw Food World Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Raw Food World | therawfoodworld.com
thread.title: Dorothy
thread.title_full: The Raw Food World reviewed by Dorothy

author: Dorothy
title: Dorothy
text: I received a double order by mistake once and the customer service reps were excellent at correcting the error immediately. I also can't recall anything that I've ever ordered I didn't like. I think Matt does an great job sourcing out the best raw foods and health products for us. I feel safe when I order from him that the product won't be watered down or adulterated in some form. Keep up the fantastic work.
